metadata.summary: is a design consultancy turning human aspiration into products and experiences

content.headline: develops beautiful solutions to complex problems
content.description: Teague is a design and innovation company that combines technological expertise with a deep understanding of human behavior. Leveraging previously completed branding and positioning work, we helped them design and build a website that could serve as the bold, new entry point to their philosophy, portfolio, and approach. Key goals of the design process included expressing Teague's differentiated point of view, grounding the brand narrative in client needs and value, and projecting their vision of a better future in a clear, digestible form.

media.alt: The about page design for the Teague website
The case study template design for the Teague website
A grid of desktop screenshots showing off the design of the Teague Website

metadata.summary: is a general contractor building resilient, future-ready projects in the PNW

content.headline: builds resilient, future-ready projects in the PNW
content.description: Rooted in the Pacific Northwest’s culture of innovation and creativity, GLY is one of the region's most respected locally-owned general contractors. We designed and built their new website from the ground up to elevate and celebrate their outcomes-minded approach to construction and provide them with a modern, dynamic platform to establish credibility, demonstrate leadership within their industry, and attract talent.

media.alt: The first five modules on the GLY homepage
A row of mobile screenshots showing off the design of the GLY Website
Close up shot of a water bottle with the new Vulcan Real Estate Logo
Detail view of the nav menu overlay on the GLY website

metadata.summary: is working to ensure positive outcomes for all

content.headline: develops imaginative spaces that propel human progress
content.description: A brainchild of Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen and the engine behind Seattle's vibrant South Lake Union neighborhood, Vulcan Real Estate is one of the Pacific Northwest’s most respected developers. After Allen’s passing, the team at Vulcan saw a need to reposition themselves in the market and reimagine their vision for the future. Alongside our partners at Stoke Strategy and Metric Media, we helped breathe new life into Vulcan’s brand with a revitalized strategy, visual identity, and website.

is making climate science actionable at scale

content.headline: is standing on the shoulders of science
content.description: Carbon Direct is a purpose-driven carbon management enabling organizations to reduce, remove, and utilize their emissions. No longer a scrappy startup, they needed a brand and digital presence that better communicated the scale and capabilities of their company and matched their approach to business — intelligent, dynamic, and distinctive.
